instructions.title: Prep - Step 1
instructions.text: Start by boiling at least {totalWater} {measurement} of water and measure out {totalCoffee} {measurement} of coffee.

instructions.title: Prep - Step 2
instructions.text: Ground {totalCoffee} {measurement} of coffee to {groundSetting} and add to your v60 and prepare to brew!

instructions.title: The Bloom
instructions.text: Pour about 40 grams of water over the surface of the grounds, just enough to wet them all.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in gentle circles in the middle 2/3 of the coffee until the scale reads 130g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour again in the middle 2/3 until scale reads 220g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 310g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 375g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Gently tug the edges of the filter to free any grounds away from the sides.

instructions.title: Your Done!
instructions.text: Let the coffee finish dripping and Enjoy!

instructions.title: Prep - Step 1
instructions.text: Start by boiling at least {totalWater} {measurement} of water and measure out {totalCoffee} {measurement} of coffee. Unfold one layer of the filter to form cone shape and place in the top of the Chemex, rinse with hot water to seat it and preheat the Chemex.

instructions.title: Prep - Step 2
instructions.text: Grind coffee and pour gently into filter. Give it a light shake to produce a even surface.

instructions.title: Prep - Step 3
instructions.text: Dump the rinse water, and place Chemex on scale and tare.

instructions.title: The Bloom
instructions.text: Pour about 60 grams of water over the surface of the grounds, just enough to wet them all.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in gentle circles in the middle 2/3 of the coffee until the scale reads 170g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour again in the middle 2/3 until scale reads 260g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 350g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 440g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 530g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour in the center until scale reads 600g.

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Very gently pour around the edges of the filter to clear any grounds from the sides.

instructions.title: Your Done!
instructions.text: Let the coffee finish dripping and Enjoy!

instructions.title: Prep - Step 1
instructions.text: Start by boiling at least {totalWater} {measurement} of water and measure out {totalCoffee} {measurement} of coffee.

instructions.title: Prep - Step 2
instructions.text: Insert the plunger into the aeropress and set it upside down on your scale. Remove the filter basket, place a filter inside and rinse it. Set next to your scale.

instructions.title: Prep - Step 3
instructions.text: Ground {totalCoffee} {measurement} of coffee to {groundSetting} and add to the inverted Aeropress. Tare your scale and prepare to brew!

instructions.title: Bloom
instructions.text: Pour 60 grams of water into the aeropress, making sure all grounds are wet.

instructions.title: Swirl
instructions.text: Pick up the aeropress and swirl in a circular motion to stir grounds for 15 seconds

instructions.title: Pour
instructions.text: Pour water until scale reads 230g.

instructions.title: Flip
instructions.text: Place the filter on top of the aeropress and flip over onto your mug or carafe.

instructions.title: Slow Plunge
instructions.text: Slowy press down on plunger so all liquid is pushed through after 45 seconds.

instructions.title: Done!
instructions.text: Stop pressing, remove filter basket and push used grounds into compost and Enjoy!
